item check the furnace vent in her room friend of mine found all sorts of stuff in her son vent when was around 12 took the responsibility of baby jesus from my mom see we had this nativity scene where the baby jesus came out of the cradle and my mom always hid him until christmas christmas morning before got up she would put him in the manger so at 12 decided was totally responsible enough we had this grandfather clock and it had spindle thing up top that an angel was placed on every year her arms bent and thought it was rather brilliant of me to cradle jesus in the angels arms well christmas came and my mom was distraught baby jesus was gone and had no recollection of moving him so joined in on the searching well lost him we put away the decorations but missed the angel we noticed week or so later but that was typical we waited to accumulate the other christmas stuff we missed and put it away all at once that year it was just the angel so she stayed looking down on us until one day in march was talking to my dad and got distracted by the angel and noticed her arms bent just so perfectly to hold yeah jesus was born in march that year just in time for easter she does have one good idea though have you looked with her toys my baby guy is also 13 months old his favorite hiding spots are the recycling bin drawer in the kitchen he can open under the couch and in
